title: The roof loading adopted in the design of such building should be at least 50 kg/sq
clause_text: The roof loading adopted in the design of such building should be at least 50 kg/sq. m for the installation of SWH system.
section: Special Provisions; for installation of Solar Water Heating (SWH) Systems.

source_pdf.text_snippet: The roof loading adopted in the design of such building should be at least 50 kg/sq. m for the installation of SWH system.
